text: The Last Tango () is a 1918 Russian silent drama movie directed by Vyacheslav Viskovsky."Молчи, грусть, молчи", или Вся правда о Вере ХолоднойПоследнее танго It stars A. Aleksandrov, Vera Kholodnaya, and Ivan Khudoleyev. The movie is based on the words of a song performed by Iza Kremer in Odesa. == Actors == * A. Aleksandrov as Kellner * Vera Kholodnaya as Chloe * Ivan Khudoleyev as Sir Stone * Ossip Runitsch as Joe == References == ==Other websites== * Category:Russian drama movies Category:Russian silent movies Category:1918 drama movies
title: The Last Tango
